La presse et le web en parlent: The press and the web talk about it
Vous proposez: You offer all your products for sale and instantly access a large targeted audience, the majority of which (67%) is in the acquisition or active research phase (source Opinion Way)
Vous mettez: You put your products on sale
Votre logo: Your logo is displayed on the zoom of products that you resell with a link to your E-shop
Le client: The customer buys on your E-shop
